markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Commoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3488)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Many commoners live hard lives of toil as they work to keep their families fed and housed in relative comfort.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Commoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3488)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 66

**Perception** +3

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +5, [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 10

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +3 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Power of the Mob**   When three or more commoners are adjacent to each other, each commoner gets a +1 circumstance bonus to [Athletic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2864) checks to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380), attack rolls, and damage rolls.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-539" />
name: Commoner
